DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether CSL425 is a safe and effective vaccine for eliciting an immune response to H1N1 influenza in healthy adults.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of CSL's 2009 H1N1 Influenza Vaccine (CSL425) in Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Male or female aged >= 18 to < 65 years at the time of providing informed consent. Known hypersensitivity to a previous dose of influenza virus vaccine or allergy to eggs, chicken protein, thiomersal, neomycin, polymyxin, or any components of the Study Vaccine.
